featured.text: Since Michael was the best candidate, the committee voted for him to take charge of the company’s sales department.
As the rumor of his scandal ______ quickly during the election campaign, more and more people began to question the honesty of the candidate.

The The company offers the most lucrative compensation selected candidate will undergo a training program to plan in the industry and has paid over $3.5 billion NTD be conducted by our manufacturer’s trained technical in commissions in just 6 years in the US.
Applicants should meet the requirements: Interested candidates please apply immediately with (1) Taiwan citizen resume and mail to P.O. box 594.
The successful candidate, usually __(19)__ two or three, was then removed from his family to Lhasa to begin spiritual training for his future role.

definition.zh_def: 候選人，指參加選舉或競爭的人。
definition.en_def: A person who applies for a job or is nominated for election.
definition.example: She is a strong candidate for the position of manager.
